title: What Matters This Week in the 2020 Race
text:
Former Vice President Joe Biden took the stage at a campaign event in Nevada Wednesday night and declared defiantly: “I’m not going anywhere.”

Normally, that would be an odd statement from the leading Democratic presidential candidate. But Mr. Biden’s statement, directed explicitly at President Trump “and his hatchet men,” was a sign of how much the impeachment debate began to cast a large shadow over the presidential race this week, which is proving a mixed blessing for Democratic presidential contenders.

...
description: Former Vice President Joe Biden will find it hard to avoid being pulled into the impeachment conversation. Moreover, there now is a danger for all the Democratic candidates that impeachment will consume so much oxygen that they find it hard to draw attention to their own initiatives.
